participant_1.background:
My children are my only living family members.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
i don t know if i enjoy programming , or if it s my only choice.
i haven t done anything since high school.
I enjoy getting lost in the world of horror movies, but I keep it to myself because it's not something my parents approve of.

participant_2.background:
I have a lot of interests that I like to spend time on, and I sometimes have trouble keeping up with my family.
my dad works at the mill and my mom is a teacher.
I'm not sure what my weight is because I don't have a scale, but I'm pretty sure I'm getting bigger.
i like tall men.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

content.text: Good! I'm about to go for a walk, but I have a few minutes to chat first. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just getting ready to start dinner.
I'm making a vegetarian chili. It's my favorite!
That sounds delicious! I love chili.
Me too! It's so easy to make and it's always a crowd-pleaser.
I bet. Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a black lab.
Aww, I love dogs! I have a cat named Mittens.
I've always wanted a cat! They're so cute.
They are! But they can be a lot of work.
They are! I love my cat so much.
Me too! My dogs are my best friends.
That's so sweet. I'm glad you have such great pets.
Me too! They make my life so much better.
